timeline.bodyText: I'm unsure if the onSlot method here does need to be called by BeaconChainController or not, but will leave it for another PR, since I want to merge this in sooner rather than later.
timeline.author: cemozerr

replies.bodyText: Yeah, not exactly sure where it should fit in - it's internal to the beacon chain so probably shouldn't be using the event channel but not sure.  Ideally I think we'd just get rid of it but will need to think through the pruning a bit more and see where it lands.
replies.author: ajsutton

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into delete-old-validator
Merge branch 'delete-old-validator' of github.com:ajsutton/teku into delete-old-validator
